item.description: From Johnny D's Website: Mikael Mutti is a Brazilian pianist, guitar player, percussionist, arranger and musical producer. His arrangements sound like fusion with roots music and Brazilian percussion. At the tender age of 12, he started to study music by himself. And at 16 years old, he started to play professionally. At 19 years old, he started to produce professional recordings, and at 22 he started as an arranger at the most prestigious recording studio in his city at the time, where he composed for radio and TV publicity. Since then, he has played with important Brazilian artists in big international music festivals around the world. He is currently playing with the Scorpions, on tour around the world. Mikael also has his own recording studio, where he produces for big name artists. Besides studying digital music production, he also dedicates himself to the study of musical improvisation. Listen to clips here: http://www.microfundo.com/mikaelmutti/
item.name: Mikael Mutti - Percussivo Mundo Novo (from Brazil)
